description: This dashboard shows live load test metrics provided by JMeter, updated bars charts.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Median")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "pct75")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "pct90")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "RPS")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Total requests")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "request" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns: ["application", "statut"])
  |> sum()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.statut)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["application"], columnKey: ["statut"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with errors: if exists r.ko then (r.ko/r.all*100.0) else 0.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["errors"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Errors Per Second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Received")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Sent")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "maxAT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Active threads")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] =~ /${transaction_mark}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${aggregation}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Transactions per second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${aggregation}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Requests per second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns:["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field",value: "Median")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns:["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"])
  |> set(key: "_field",value:"pct75")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns:["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"])
  |> set(key: "_field",value:"pct90")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg" or r._field == "max" or r._field == "min" or r._field == "pct50.0" or r._field == "pct75.0" or r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction", "_field"])
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns: ["transaction","_field"])
  |> median()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["transaction"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"pct50.0": "pct50"})
  |> rename(columns: {"pct75.0": "pct75"})
  |> rename(columns: {"pct90.0": "pct90"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: 60))}))
  |> median()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "RPS"})
  |> keep(columns: ["RPS", "transaction"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> group(columns: ["transaction", "statut"])
  |> sum()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.statut)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["transaction"], columnKey: ["statut"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Errors: if exists r.ko then (r.ko/r.all*100.0) else 0.0 }))
  |> rename(columns: {"all": "Count"})
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","Errors","Count"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> stddev()
  |> toInt()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "stddev"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${aggregation}))}))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /${transaction_mark}/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["responseCode"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["responseCode"] != "0")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction", "responseCode", "responseMessage"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction", "responseCode", "responseMessage"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${app}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["responseCode"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /${transaction_mark}/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction", "responseCode"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["transaction", "responseCode"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "application",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events",
    start: 0
  )
list.label: app
list.name: app
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "application",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events",
    start: 0
  )

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "testTitle",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events" and r.application == "${app}",
    start: -1000d
  )
list.label: testTitle
list.name: testTitle
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "testTitle",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events" and r.application == "${app}",
    start: -1000d
  )

title: JMeter test results STANDARD LISTENER
